content: Import users and groups via LDAP, and enable user authentication through logins/passwords stored on the LDAP server. Users will be imported immediately after the settings are saved. Users added later will be imported during their first authentication. If you want to provide access via LDAP only, disable the option to invite new {{productName}} members via Contacts: <1>{{link}}</1>

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a brief introduction explaining the purpose and functionality of LDAP integration. It provides context for users about what this feature enables and how it affects their experience, typically appearing in a settings or configuration page where LDAP options are being configured.
